name: Great Big Burger
description: Fire up the grill to make mouth-watering, better than take-out burgers all season long! Top with better-for-you Big Burger Sauce for the best burger of your life.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: In a bowl, combine beef with egg and seasoning. Form into four patties.
Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed, 4 min per side or until an instant-read thermometer reads 160° F.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine mayonnaise with sauce mix, ketchup, and relish.
Tuck patties into buns and serve with sauce and toppings.
tips: Swap mayonnaise with 2% plain Greek yogurt for a thicker, tangier sauce.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp favourite Epicure Dressing.
